AI Description: The r-hdf5array package provides HDF5-based storage for array-like objects in R. It allows for efficient storage and manipulation of large arrays, with support for data compression and chunking.
Core Features:
1. Storage of large array-like objects in HDF5 format
2. Efficient manipulation of array data
3. Support for data compression and chunking
4. Integration with R programming language for data analysis and visualization
General Tags: Data Storage, Manipulation, Data Compression, R Programming, Hdf5 Format
